CustomField.formula: If(ISPICKVAL(Related_Issue__r.Issue_Status__c, 'TRIAGE'), 'TRIAGE', If( ISPICKVAL(Related_Issue__r.Issue_Status__c, 'ICEBOX'), 'ICEBOX', If( ISPICKVAL(Related_Issue__r.Issue_Status__c, 'TO DO'), 'TO DO', If( ISPICKVAL(Related_Issue__r.Issue_Status__c, 'REOPENED'), 'REOPENED', If( ISPICKVAL(Related_Issue__r.Issue_Status__c, 'IN DEVELOPMENT'), 'IN DEVELOPMENT', If( ISPICKVAL(Related_Issue__r.Issue_Status__c, 'BLOCKED OR WAITING'), 'BLOCKED OR WAITING', If(ISPICKVAL(Related_Issue__r.Issue_Status__c, 'RESOLVED'), 'RESOLVED',If(ISPICKVAL(Related_Issue__r.Issue_Status__c, 'CLOSED'), 'CLOSED', '0'))))))))
CustomField.label: Related Issue Status
